mean_cn: n. 狂热份子，犹太教狂热信徒
mean_en: a person who has very strong feelings about something (such as religion or politics) and who wants other people to have those feelings :a zealous person
word_etyma: zeal热心+ot名词后缀，表示人→热心者，狂热者
sentence: Religious zealots will never stop talking about God.
sentence_trans: 宗教狂热分子从不会停止谈论上帝。
